content.statement: marfan-002-cardiovascular is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Genetic-Connective-Tissue Marfan-Syndrome that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding marfan-002-cardiovascular helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of marfan-002-cardiovascular include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of marfan-002-cardiovascular.

mitral_valve.manifestation: Mitral valve prolapse with variable regurgitation

manifestations.other_aortic: Descending aortic dilation, dissection can extend beyond root

surveillance.frequency: Echocardiography annually (more frequent if enlarging or approaching threshold)
imaging: MRA or CTA for entire aorta annually if dilated distal aorta

medical_management.beta_blockers: Standard of care - reduce rate of dilation, reduce aortic wall stress
medical_management.losartan: ARB with TGF-β blocking effect - may have additional benefit (COMPARE trial)

bentall_procedure.description: Composite valve graft (mechanical valve + aortic graft) with coronary reimplantation

valve_sparing_root.david_procedure: Root replacement with reimplantation of native valve into graft
valve_sparing_root.yacoub_procedure: Root remodeling with replacement of sinuses
valve_sparing_root.advantages: No anticoagulation, may be better for young patients
valve_sparing_root.outcomes: 95% freedom from reoperation at 15 years in experienced centers

definition.@value: Aortic root dilation and mitral valve disease in Marfan syndrome, requiring surveillance and prophylactic surgery

clinical_pearls: Prophylactic surgery transformed Marfan from 40-year to near-normal lifespan
Operate at 5.0 cm (4.5 cm with risk factors) - before dissection
Valve-sparing root replacement preferred in experienced centers when valve healthy
Beta-blockers are standard of care - reduce aortic wall stress and dilation rate

sources.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
